name: Pesto Carrot Adlai
description: This Pesto Carrot Adlai recipe is a perfect example of a healthified meal that doesn't compromise on flavor. With low-sodium and low-sugar ingredients, it's an excellent choice for those looking to enjoy healthy recipes without forsaking taste. The combination of Adlai rice, fresh pesto, and yellow carrots, all brought together with a hint of garlic and a splash of fresh lemon juice, makes this dish a delightful, nutritious option for any meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Adlai Rice under cold water until the water runs clear.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Adlai Rice according to package instructions until tender, about 20 minutes, then set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the yellow carrot and mince the garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, heat the fish oil over medium heat and saut√© the diced carrot and minced garlic until they're softened, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cooked Adlai Rice with the carrot and garlic mixture. Stir in the pesto sauce and fresh squeezed lemon juice until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
